titleStmt.title: Microcosmus A morall maske, presented vvith generall liking, at the private house in Salisbury Court, and heere set down according to the intention of the authour Thomas Nabbes.
titleStmt.author: Nabbes, Thomas, 1605?-1645?

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Richard Oulton for Charles Greene, and are to be sold at the white Lyon in Pauls Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Library of Congress.

place.placeName: the white Lyon in Pauls Church-yard
